making changes, reasons given on the talk page

/* Church of Christ, Scientist */ formating ref
/* Theology */ neutral language-"every one of us"==>"every person"
/* Science */ Mary Baker Eddy==>Eddy, formating refs
/* Philosophy */ rm italics from phrase in 1st sentence, formating refs
/* Prayer */ formating citations, book title in italics
/* Beliefs */ moving "Prayer" subsection above "Healing" as from the article, one must first understand prayer to understand healing

/* Social views */ rm "Views on homosexuality" header, wikilinking "homosexuality"
moving "Christian Science and civil society" and subsection above "Controversies", renaming "Social views"
/* Church of Christ, Scientist */ added "Main article" notice
creating "Organizations" section and placing "Church of Christ, Scientist" and "Dissensions" as subsections within it, renaming "Dissensions" to "Other groups"
Date maintenance tags and general fixes
Creating "Beliefs" section and moving all sections describing religious beliefs as subsections of this section
book/periodical titles in italics, Mary Baker Eddy==>Eddy
/* Christian Science and civil society */ rm parenthesis

/* Prayer */ assimilating scripture references into the text

/* Healing */ God is wikilinked elsewhere in the article, lowercasing "Creator"
/* Overview */ fact and clarification needed tags
revert to restore NPOV as much as possible and to reduce argumentation
/* External links */ EB1911 article in Wikisource
/* Theology */ replaced potentially confusing term "idea" with "concept"
Cleanup and removal of unnecessary verbiage
/* Overview */ Removed a citation that was not valid

removing edits which did not improve readability of the article ([[WP:HG|HG]])
